00010 using std::pair;
00011 
00012 struct Region
00013         {
00014         long int *sumIntensity;
00015         int *nbPoints;
00016         };
00017 
00018 inline int labelToOffset(TLabel label)
00019 {
00020         return (int)(label-1);
00021 }
00022 
00023 inline double computePriority(pair <long int, int> offset, Image <U8> &src, struct Region  &region)
00024 {
00025         assert(region.nbPoints[labelToOffset(offset.second)]!=0);
00026         double moy=(double)region.sumIntensity[labelToOffset(offset.second)]/region.nbPoints[labelToOffset(offset.second)];
00027         double prio=fabs(src(offset.first)-moy);
00028         return prio;
00029 }

00036 
00037 template <class T, class T2>
00038 void RegionGrowingCriterion(Image <T> &src, Image <T2> &marker, FlatSE &se, bool observe=false)
00039 {
00040         int bufferSize=src.getBufSize();
00041         int *imageSize=src.getSize();
00042         int seedsNumber=marker.getMax();
00043         se.setContext(imageSize);
00044         using std::multimap;
00045         
00046         Image <U8> tmp=src;
00047         
00048         int dx=src.getSizeX();
00049         int dy=src.getSizeY();
00050         int dz=src.getSizeZ();
00051         
00052         int max=std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
00053         int min=std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00054         
00055         bool *processedPoints=new bool [bufferSize];
00056         bool *inSet=new bool [bufferSize];
00057         Image <T2> *regionSet=new Image <T2> [seedsNumber]; 
00058         multimap <long int, int > neighborSet;
00059         multimap <long int, int >::iterator itSet;
00060         
00061         struct Region sRegion;
00062         sRegion.sumIntensity=new long int[seedsNumber];
00063         sRegion.nbPoints=new int [seedsNumber];
00064         
00065         //Init all the regions 
00066         for(int i=0; i<seedsNumber; i++)
00067                 {
00068                 regionSet[i].setSize(imageSize);
00069                 sRegion.sumIntensity[i]=0;
00070                 sRegion.nbPoints[i]=0;
00071                 }
00072                 
00073         for(int i=0; i<bufferSize; i++)
00074                 {
00075                 TLabel label=marker(i);
00076                 for(int j=0; j<seedsNumber; j++)
00077                         {
00078                         regionSet[j](i)=0;
00079                         }
00080                 inSet[i]=false;
00081                 if(label!=T2(0) )
00082                         {
00083                         regionSet[labelToOffset(label)](i)=label;
00084                         processedPoints[i]=true;
00085                         sRegion.sumIntensity[labelToOffset(label)]+=src(i);
00086                         sRegion.nbPoints[labelToOffset(label)]++;
00087                         }
00088                 else
00089                         processedPoints[i]=false;               
00090                 }
00091         
00092                 std::set <TLabel> nLabel;
00093                 for(int z=0; z<dz; z++)
00094                         for(int y=0; y<dy; y++)
00095                                 for(int x=0; x<dx; x++)
00096                                         {
00097                                         Point <TCoord> p(x,y,z);
00098                                         bool neighbor=false;
00099                                         if(marker.isPosValid(x,y,z) )
00100                                                 {
00101                                                 if(marker(p)==T2(0) )
00102                                                         {
00103                                                         for(int i=0; i<se.getNbPoints(); i++)
00104                                                                 {
00105                                                                 Point<TCoord> q=p+se.getPoint(i);
00106                                                                 if(marker(q)!=T2(0) )
00107                                                                         {
00108                                                                         nLabel.insert(marker(q));
00109                                                                         neighbor=true;
00110                                                                         }
00111                                                                 }
00112                                                         if(neighbor==true)
00113                                                                 {
00114                                                                 int offset=z*dx*dy+y*dx+x;
00115                                                                 //Using set allows the neighbors label to be inserted once in the multimap neighborSet
00116                                                                 for(std::set<TLabel>::iterator it=nLabel.begin(); it!=nLabel.end(); ++it)
00117                                                                         neighborSet.insert(std::make_pair(offset,*it));
00118                                                                 inSet[offset]=true;
00119                                                                 }
00120                                                         }
00121                                                 }
00122                                         }
00123         //neighborSet contains the set of neighbors of all regions (seeds)
00124         bool stop=false;
00125         int iter=0;
00126         int nbFrame=0;
00127 
00128         while(!stop)
00129         {
00130         iter++;
00131         //std::cout << "Number of neighbors: " << neighborSet.size() << "   " << iter << "\n";
00132         //we search for the neighbor having the maximum priority (here least)
00133         pair <long int, int> bestOffset;
00134         std::vector <pair <long int ,int> > bestOffsetList;
00135         double minPrio;
00136         double currentPrio;
00137 
00138         minPrio=std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00139         bestOffsetList.clear();
00140         for(itSet=neighborSet.begin(); itSet!=neighborSet.end(); ++itSet)
00141                 {
00142                 pair <long int, int> currentOffset=*itSet;
00143                 currentPrio=computePriority(currentOffset, src,sRegion);
00144 
00145                 if(fabs(currentPrio-minPrio)<0.0000001)
00146                         {
00147                         bestOffsetList.push_back(currentOffset);
00148                         }
00149                 else if(currentPrio<minPrio) 
00150                         {
00151                         bestOffsetList.clear();
00152                         minPrio=currentPrio;
00153                         bestOffsetList.push_back(currentOffset);
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156         std::vector <pair <long int ,int> >::iterator itO;
00157         if(bestOffsetList.size()>1) std::cout <<iter << " Egalité entre plusieurs points!!!!\n";
00158         for(itO=bestOffsetList.begin(); itO!=bestOffsetList.end(); ++itO)
00159                 {
00160                 //process the point(s)
00161                 //first erase it from the set of neighbors
00162                 neighborSet.erase(itO->first);
00163                 //update the marker image
00164                 marker(itO->first)=itO->second;
00165                 //update the region attributes
00166                 sRegion.sumIntensity[labelToOffset(itO->second)]+=src(itO->first);
00167                 sRegion.nbPoints[labelToOffset(itO->second)]++;
00168                 
00169                 //std::cout << "Marker(" << bestOffset.first << ")=" << bestOffset.second << "\n";
00170                 //mark the point as processed (never process it again)
00171                 processedPoints[itO->first]=true;
00172                 }
00173         //second pass: add neighbors
00174         for(itO=bestOffsetList.begin(); itO!=bestOffsetList.end(); ++itO)
00175                 {
00176                 for(int i=0; i<se.getNbPoints(); i++)
00177                         {
00178                         long int qo=itO->first + se.getOffset(i);
00179                         if(src.isPosValid(qo))
00180                                 if( processedPoints[qo]==false )
00181                                 {
00182                                 typedef std::multimap<long int, int>::const_iterator I;
00183                                 pair <I,I> nOffset=neighborSet.equal_range(itO->first);
00184                                 bool isInserted=false;
00185                                 for(I it=nOffset.first; it!=nOffset.second; ++it)
00186                                         {
00187                                         if(marker(itO->first)==it->second)
00188                                                 {
00189                                                 isInserted=true;
00190                                                 break;
00191                                                 }
00192                                         }
00193                                 if(!isInserted)
00194                                         neighborSet.insert(std::make_pair(qo,marker(itO->first)));
00195                                 inSet[qo]=true;
00196                                 }
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199         
00200         //If observe, generate animation
00201         if(observe)
00202                 {nbFrame++; 
00203                 std::stringstream s;
00204                 s.width(3);
00205                 s.fill('0');
00206                 s << nbFrame;
00207                 std::stringstream name;
00208                 name << "Anims/RG_criterion_"<<s.str()<< ".pgm";
00209                 //std::cout << "Writing: " << name.str() << "\n";
00210                 for(int i=0; i<tmp.getBufSize(); i++) tmp(i)=(unsigned char)marker(i);
00211                 adjustContrast(tmp);
00212                 tmp.save(name.str().c_str() );
00213                 }
00214         if(neighborSet.empty()==true) stop=true;
00215         }
00216         
00217         delete inSet;
00218         delete sRegion.sumIntensity;
00219         delete sRegion.nbPoints;
00220         delete processedPoints;
00221         delete[] regionSet;
00222 }

00225 
00250 template <class T>
00251 void seededRegionGrowingExactAlgorithm(Image <T> &im, Image <TLabel> &marker, FlatSE &se, bool observe=false)
00252 {
00253         Image <T> imBorder=im;
00254         Image <TLabel> markerBorder=marker;
00255         
00256         typename Image<TLabel>::iteratorXYZ it;
00257         typename Image<TLabel>::iteratorXYZ end=marker.end();
00258         
00259         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00260         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00261         
00262         TLabel BORDER=-1;
00263         
00264         addBorders(imBorder, back,front, T(0));
00265         addBorders(markerBorder, back,front, BORDER);
00266         Image<bool> imageContourBorder(markerBorder.getSize() );
00267         imageContourBorder.fill(false);
00268         se.setContext(markerBorder.getSize() );
00269         
00270         //Regions are stocked as lists of offsets in a map
00271         typedef std::vector<TOffset> offsetsContainerType;
00272         typedef std::map<TLabel, offsetsContainerType > regionsType;
00273         regionsType regions;
00274         
00275         FlatSE::iterator_point itSePoint;
00276         FlatSE::iterator_point endSePoint=se.end_point();
00277         
00278         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00279         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00280         
00281         ImageRegionsInfos <T, TLabel> imageRegionsHelper(imBorder,markerBorder);
00282         
00283         //Put the contour of the region seeds in the regions
00284         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00285                 {
00286                 if(*it!=TLabel(0))
00287                         {
00288                         bool isContour=false;
00289                         for(itSePoint=se.begin_point(); itSePoint!=endSePoint; ++itSePoint)
00290                         {
00291                                 Point <TCoord> q=Point<TCoord> (it.x,it.y,it.z)+(*itSePoint);
00292                                 if(marker.isPosValid(q))
00293                                         if(marker(q)==0)
00294                                                 isContour=true;
00295                         }
00296                         //Compute offset in the markerBorder
00297                         TOffset offset=(it.x+back[0])+(it.y+back[1])*markerBorder.getSizeX()
00298                         +(it.z+back[2])*markerBorder.getSizeX()*markerBorder.getSizeY();
00299                         if(isContour) {                                         
00300                                 imageContourBorder(offset)=true;
00301                                 //Put offset in the corresponding region
00302                                 regions[*it].push_back(offset);
00303                         }
00304                         imageRegionsHelper.setPoint(offset,*it);
00305                         }
00306                 }
00307         //std::cout << "Size of contour points: " << regions[1].size() << "\n";
00308         typename offsetsContainerType::iterator itC;
00309         
00310         typename regionsType::iterator itR;
00311         typename regionsType::iterator endR=regions.end();
00312         
00313         TOffset bestOffset;
00314         double bestDist;
00315         TLabel bestRegion;
00316         bestDist=std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00317         
00318         bool stop=false;
00319         
00320         int iter=0;
00321         
00322         while(!stop) {
00323         stop=true;
00324         // 1) Search for the "best" offset
00325         for(itR=regions.begin(); itR!=endR; ++itR)
00326                 {
00327                 //browse offsets
00328                 
00329                 for(itC=itR->second.begin(); itC!=itR->second.end(); ++itC)
00330                         {
00331                         //std::cout << "On browse les points \n";
00332                         TOffset p=*itC;
00333                         if(imageContourBorder(*itC)==true) {
00334                         bool isContour=false;
00335                         for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00336                                 {
00337                                 TOffset q=p+ *itSe;
00338                                 if(markerBorder(q)==0)
00339                                         {
00340                                         stop=false;
00341                                         isContour=true;
00342                                         //Compute distance
00343                                         double dist=imageRegionsHelper.computeDistance( p , q);
00344                                         if(dist<bestDist)
00345                                                 {
00346                                                 bestDist=dist;
00347                                                 bestOffset=q;
00348                                                 bestRegion=markerBorder(p);
00349                                                 }
00350                                         }
00351                                 }
00352                         //Test to remove interior points
00353                         // They will not be processed anymore
00354                         if(!isContour)
00355                                 {
00356                                 imageContourBorder(p)=false;
00357                                 //itR->second.erase(itC);
00358                                 //std::cout << "Erase. Size: " << itR->second.size() << "\n";
00359                                 }
00360                         }
00361                 }
00362         }
00363                 
00364         //2) Put the best offset in the corresponding region
00365         
00366         if(!stop) 
00367                 {
00368                 if(markerBorder(bestOffset)==0) {
00369                 
00370                 //std::cout << "On assigne un point! iter= " << iter << "\n";
00371                 imageRegionsHelper.setPoint(bestOffset,bestRegion);
00372                 iter++;}
00373                 // Put it in the region contour
00374                 // WARNING: we should remove its neighbors that are not anymore contour points (they are now "inside"
00375                 // the region. The complexity may explode. That is why we add the "imageContourBorder" image
00376                 
00377                 regions[bestRegion].push_back(bestOffset);
00378                 imageContourBorder(bestOffset)=true;;
00379                 }
00380         }
00381         
00382         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00383                 *it=markerBorder(it.x+back[0],it.y+back[1],it.z+back[2]);
00384                 
00385 }

00391 template <class T, class T2>
00392 void RegionGrowingSalembierBasic(GImage <T> &src, GImage <T2> &marker, GFlatSE &se, bool observe=false)
00393 {
00394         GOrderedQueue <GPoint >oq;

00405         map <T2, double> sumIntensityRegions;
00406         map <T2, int>    nbPointsRegions;

00500 
00505 
00506 template <class T, class T2>
00507 void seededRegionGrowing(Image <T> &img, Image <T2> &marker, FlatSE &se, bool observe=false)
00508 {
00509         OrderedQueueDouble <TOffset> oq;
00510         
00511         Image <T> imBorder=img;
00512         Image <T2> markerBorder=marker;
00513         
00514         double maxDouble=std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00515         double BORDER=-1;
00516         double INIT=-2;
00517         
00520         
00521         Image <double> inFilePrio(marker.getSize() );
00522         inFilePrio.fill(INIT);
00523         
00524         typename Image<T2>::iteratorXYZ it;
00525         typename Image<T2>::iteratorXYZ end=marker.end();
00526         
00527         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00528         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00529         
00530         T maxValueT=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00531         T2 maxValueT2=std::numeric_limits<T2>::max();
00532 
00533         //Now enlarge the images
00534         addBorders(imBorder,back,front,maxValueT);
00535         addBorders(markerBorder,back,front, maxValueT2);
00536         addBorders(inFilePrio,back,front, BORDER);
00537         se.setContext(imBorder.getSize());
00538         
00539         ImageRegionsInfos <T, T2> imageRegions(imBorder,markerBorder);
00540         
00541         //Put the markers in the queue
00542         //For this, we scan the inner part of marker (without the borders)
00543         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00544                 {
00545                 if(*it!=0)
00546                         {
00547                         //Highest priority for the seeds
00548                         double value=0.0; 
00549                         //compute the offset in the border image
00550                         TOffset offsetBorder=it.x+back[0]+(it.y+back[1])*markerBorder.getSizeX()+
00551                         (it.z+back[2])*markerBorder.getSizeX()*markerBorder.getSizeY();
00552                         oq.put(value,offsetBorder);
00553                         
00554                         imageRegions.setPoint(offsetBorder,*it);
00555                         }
00556                 }
00557                 
00558         
00559         
00560         //std::cout << "Image size: " << marker.getBufSize() << "\n";
00561         
00562         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00563         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00564         
00565 int nbProcess=0;
00566 bool flag=false;
00567 while(!oq.empty())
00568                 {
00569                 TOffset p=oq.get();
00570         
00571                 //Put neighbors of markers in the queue (the sequel of the initialization part)
00572                 //points that have been inserted several times are not processed 
00573                 //because inFilePrio(p)!=INIT
00574                 
00575                 if(markerBorder(p)!=T2(0) && inFilePrio(p) == INIT)
00576                         {
00577                         for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00578                                 {
00579                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00580                                         
00581                                         if(markerBorder(q)==T2(0) /*&& inFilePrio(q) == INIT*/)
00582                                         {
00583                                         double prio=imageRegions.computeDistance( p , q);
00584                                         //First approximation
00585                                         //To do better, we can update the priority of q (if it is necessary)
00586                                         //Hence each point can be inserted several times
00587                                         //the most prioritary point are processed first: hence
00588                                         //the other similar points are not processed (since markerBorder!=0 && inFilePrio!=INIT)
00589                                         if(prio < inFilePrio(q) || inFilePrio(q)==INIT);
00590                                                 {
00591                                                 oq.put(prio, q); 
00592                                                 inFilePrio(q)=prio;
00593                                                 }
00594                                         }
00595                                         
00596                                 }                       
00597                         }
00598                 else if (markerBorder(p)==T2(0) ) {
00599                         //p is an active points waiting to be labelled
00600                         //First we compute the distance between this point and all the neighboring
00601                         //regions
00602                         double prio=std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00603                         TOffset bestQ;
00604                         
00605                                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00606                                         {
00607                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00608                                         
00609                                         if(markerBorder(q)!=T2(0) && inFilePrio(q)!=BORDER /*avoid the border points*/)
00610                                                 {
00611                                                 
00612                                                 double tmpPrio=imageRegions.computeDistance(q,p);
00613                                                 
00614                                                 if(tmpPrio<prio )
00615                                                         {
00616                                                         prio=tmpPrio;
00617                                                         bestQ=q;
00618                                                         }       
00619                                                 }
00620                                         }
00621                                 //we label p with the region having the least distance
00622                                 imageRegions.setPoint(p,markerBorder(bestQ));   
00623                                 
00624                                 nbProcess++;
00625                                 
00626                                 //Scan neighbors, compute disntaces and update (if necessary)
00627                                 //the priorities of neighbors
00628                                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00629                                         {
00630                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00631                                         
00632                                         if(markerBorder(q)==T2(0) && inFilePrio(q)!=BORDER)
00633                                                 {
00634                                                 double prio=imageRegions.computeDistance(p,q);
00635                                                 if(prio < inFilePrio(q) || inFilePrio(q)==INIT )
00636                                                         {
00637                                                         oq.put(prio,q); 
00638                                                         inFilePrio(q)=prio;
00639                                                         }
00640                                                 
00641                                                 }
00642                                         }               
00643                 }
00644         }
00645                                 
00646         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00647                 *it=markerBorder(it.x+back[0],it.y+back[1],it.z+back[2]);
00648 }
00649 
00652 template <class T, class T2>
00653 void seededRegionGrowing0(Image <T> &img, Image <T2> &marker, FlatSE &se, bool observe=false)
00654 {
00655         OrderedQueueDouble <TOffset> oq;
00656         
00657         Image <T> imBorder=img;
00658         Image <T2> markerBorder=marker;
00659         
00660         typename Image<T2>::iteratorXYZ it;
00661         typename Image<T2>::iteratorXYZ end=marker.end();
00662         
00663         TCoord *back=se.getNegativeOffsets();
00664         TCoord *front=se.getPositiveOffsets();
00665         
00666         T maxValueT=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00667         T2 maxValueT2=std::numeric_limits<T2>::max();
00668 
00669         //Now enlarge the images
00670         addBorders(imBorder,back,front,maxValueT);
00671         addBorders(markerBorder,back,front, maxValueT2);
00672         se.setContext(imBorder.getSize());
00673         
00674         ImageRegionsInfos <T, T2> imageRegions(imBorder,markerBorder);
00675         
00676         //Put the markers in the queue
00677         //For this, we scan the inner part of marker (without the borders)
00678         TOffset offset=0;
00679         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it,offset++)
00680                 {
00681                 if(*it!=T2(0))
00682                         {
00683                         //Highest priority for the seeds
00684                         double value=0.0; 
00685                         //compute the offset in the border image
00686                         TOffset offsetBorder=it.x+back[0]+(it.y+back[1])*markerBorder.getSizeX()+
00687                         (it.z+back[2])*markerBorder.getSizeX()*markerBorder.getSizeY();
00688                         oq.put(value,offsetBorder);
00689                         imageRegions.setPoint(offsetBorder,*it);
00690                         }
00691                 }
00692                 
00693         
00694         
00695         double INIT=-1;
00696         
00698         Image <double> inFilePrio(markerBorder.getSize() );
00699         inFilePrio.fill(INIT );
00700         
00701         //std::cout << "Image size: " << marker.getBufSize() << "\n";
00702         
00703         FlatSE::iterator itSe;
00704         FlatSE::iterator endSe=se.end();
00705         
00706 int nbProcess=0;
00707 while(!oq.empty())
00708                 {
00709                 TOffset p=oq.get();
00710         
00711                 //Put neighbors of markers in the queue
00712                 if(markerBorder(p)!=T2(0) )
00713                         {
00714                         for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00715                                 {
00716                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00717                                         
00718                                         if(markerBorder(q)==T2(0) && inFilePrio(q) == INIT)
00719                                         {
00720                                         double prio=imageRegions.computeDistance( p , q);
00721                                         //if(prio < inFilePrio(q) );
00722                                                 //{
00723                                                 oq.put(prio, q); 
00724                                                 inFilePrio(q)=prio;
00725                                                 //}
00726                                         }
00727                                 }                       
00728                         }
00729                 else {
00730                         double prio=std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00731                         TOffset bestQ=-1;
00732                         bool flag=false;
00733                                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00734                                         {
00735                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00736                                         
00737                                         if(markerBorder(q)!=T2(0) && markerBorder(q)!=maxValueT2)
00738                                                 {
00739                                                 flag=true;
00740                                                 double tmpPrio=imageRegions.computeDistance(q,p);
00741                                                 
00742                                                 if(tmpPrio<prio )
00743                                                         {
00744                                                         prio=tmpPrio;
00745                                                         bestQ=q;
00746                                                         }       
00747                                                 }
00748                                         }
00749                                 
00750                                 imageRegions.setPoint(p,markerBorder(bestQ));   
00751                                 
00752                                 nbProcess++;
00753                                 
00754                                 for(itSe=se.begin(); itSe!=endSe; ++itSe)
00755                                         {
00756                                         TOffset q=p + *itSe;
00757                                         
00758                                         if(markerBorder(q)==T2(0) && inFilePrio(q)==INIT )
00759                                                 {
00760                                                 double prio=imageRegions.computeDistance(p,q);
00761                                                 oq.put(prio,q); 
00762                                                 inFilePrio(q)=prio;
00763                                                 }
00764                                         }               
00765                 }
00766         }
00767         
00768         for(it=marker.begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00769                 *it=markerBorder(it.x+back[0],it.y+back[1],it.z+back[2]);
00770 }
00771 
00774 }
